sentences.en: He hasn't the least foreknowledge of this matter.
sentences.cn: 关于此事他事先一点也不知道.

sentences.en: Roughly put, the problem of divine foreknowledge is as follows.
sentences.cn: 粗略地放, 神圣预知的问题如下.

sentences.en: She has maintained that the General had foreknowledge of the plot.
sentences.cn: 她坚称将军已经预先知晓了这个阴谋。

sentences.en: There is in your complacency no foreknowledge of death nor even of separation.
sentences.cn: 你自得其乐,对生离死别都无先见之明.

trans.tran_en: knowledge that something is going to happen before it actually does
